Package fileManager

Class CollectionManager

java.lang.Object
fileManager.CollectionManager
public class CollectionManager extends Object
The CollectionManager class manages a collection of movies.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CollectionManager()
    Constructs a CollectionManager object with an empty collection of movies.
